isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING GEAR: SHEPPARD MODEL 292, 392, 492 - LUBRICATION - BEARING CAP

svcproc.title: BEARING CAP
svcproc.para: To lubricate the dirt and salt seals in the bearing cap and flush out any contaminants that have passed these seals, chassis grease should be added with low pressure when the vehicle is serviced.

The grease between the dirt and salt seals protects the actuating shaft from rust and corrosion and in addition keeps foreign materials from getting into the high pressure seal area. The bearing cap should be serviced at least four times a year, more frequently where the truck is operating in an atmosphere where dust and abrasive or corrosive materials are present.
